TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDesignerFilter

summary.span: 提供使设计器能够访问和筛选 字典的接口，它存储组件设计器可以向设计时环境公开的属性、特性和事件说明符。

span.span: Provides an interface that enables a designer to access and filter the dictionaries of a that stores the property, attribute, and event descriptors that a component designer can expose to the design-time environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使设计器来筛选其关联的组件通过公开的属性、 属性和事件描述符集。 enables a designer to filter the set of property, attribute, and event descriptors that its associated component exposes through a . 此接口的方法名称开头`Pre`名称开头的方法之后，立即调用`Post`。The methods of this interface whose names begin with `Pre` are called immediately before the methods whose names begin with `Post`. 如果你想要添加属性、 事件或属性描述符，使用， ，或方法。If you want to add attribute, event, or property descriptors, use a , , or method. 如果你想要更改或删除属性、 事件或属性描述符，使用， ，或方法。If you want to change or remove attribute, event, or property descriptors, use a , , or method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写，向属性窗口添加设计器的属性，在设计时选择设计器的控件时。The following example demonstrates an override of that adds a property of the designer to the Properties window when the designer's control is selected at design time. 请参阅示例类设计器使用完整示例，接口。See the example for the class for a complete designer example that uses the interface. [!code-cpp[ControlDesignerExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlDesignerExample/CPP/controldesignerexample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ControlDesignerExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlDesignerExample/CS/controldesignerexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ControlDesignerExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlDesignerExample/VB/controldesignerexample.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PostFilterAttributes(class System.Collections.IDictionary attributes) cil managed

param.name: attributes

span.span: The objects for the class of the component.

param.span: 特性字典中的关键字是特性的 值。

span.span: The keys in the dictionary of attributes are the values of the attributes.

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写后，允许设计器更改或移除它通过 公开的特性集中的项。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a designer to change or remove items from the set of attributes that it exposes through a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使您能够更改或删除通过来实现此接口的设计器关联的组件公开的属性的字典中的项。This method provides a way to change or remove items within the dictionary of attributes that the associated component of the designer implementing this interface exposes through a . 属性的字典中的键是属性的类型 Id。The keys in the dictionary of attributes are the type IDs of the attributes. 对象属于类型。The objects are of type . 之后，立即调用此方法。This method is called immediately after . 属性的类型 ID 可以是任何对象。The type ID of an attribute can be any object. 默认情况下，返回其的值作为其属性。By default, returns its as the value of its property. 你可以检查与已知等效字典中的特性属性标识它，或使用以确定其自身的属性对象。You can check the of an attribute in the dictionary for equivalence with a known for an attribute to identify it, or use to identify the attribute object itself. 当具有相同的属性因为现有的或继承的属性添加到某一组件，则新特性将取代旧的属性。When an attribute that has the same as an existing or inherited attribute is added to a component, the new attribute replaces the old attribute. 许多属性而言，对于相同类型的新属性将替换先前类型的所有属性。For many attributes, a new attribute of the same type will replace any previous attribute of the type. 但是，某些类型的属性返回，有选择地区分特性。However, some types of attributes return a that distinguishes the attribute selectively. 例如，为了提供不同类型的同时处于活动状态的设计器对于类型，如和、类返回唯一标识该属性和基本设计器类型。For example, in order to provide different types of simultaneously active designers for a type, such as an and an , the class returns a that uniquely identifies both the attribute and the base designer type. 构造函数，可指定其特定的类型，除了设计器的基本设计器类型和返回反映这。The constructor allows you to specify the base designer type of the designer in addition to its specific type, and returns a that reflects this. 因此在添加新具有与现有的基本设计器类型相同的类型的基本设计器类型，旧的属性将替换为新属性。Therefore when you add a new with a base designer type of the same type as the base designer type of an existing , the old attribute is replaced with the new attribute.

para.span: 你可以直接筛选字典可通过访问参数，或也可以将其保持不变。

span.span: You can directly filter the dictionary that is accessible through the parameter, or you can leave it unchanged.

para.span: 执行你自己的筛选后，如果你要重写此方法，调用基实现。

span.span: If you are overriding this method, call the base implementation after you perform your own filtering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提供了一种方法来更改或删除项目在字典中的事件的通过公开。This method provides a way to change or remove items within the dictionary of events that are exposed through a . 中的事件字典的键是事件的名称。The keys in the dictionary of events are the names of the events. 对象属于类型。The objects are of type . 之后，立即调用此方法。This method is called immediately after .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使您能够将项添加到通过来实现此接口的设计器关联的组件公开的属性的字典。This method provides a way to add items to the dictionary of attributes that the associated component of the designer implementing this interface exposes through a . 属性的字典中的键是属性的类型 Id。The keys in the dictionary of attributes are the type IDs of the attributes. 对象属于类型。The objects are of type . 立即之前调用此方法。This method is called immediately before . 属性的类型 ID 可以是任何对象。The type ID of an attribute can be any object. 默认情况下，返回其的值作为其属性。By default, returns its as the value of its property. 你可以检查与已知等效字典中的特性属性标识它，或使用以确定其自身的属性对象。You can check the of an attribute in the dictionary for equivalence with a known for an attribute to identify it, or use to identify the attribute object itself. 当具有相同的属性因为现有的或继承的属性添加到某一组件，则新特性将取代旧的属性。When an attribute that has the same as an existing or inherited attribute is added to a component, the new attribute replaces the old attribute. 许多属性而言，对于相同类型的新属性将替换先前类型的所有属性。For many attributes, a new attribute of the same type will replace any previous attribute of the type. 但是，某些类型的属性返回，有选择地区分特性。However, some types of attributes return a that distinguishes the attribute selectively. 例如，为了提供不同类型的同时处于活动状态的设计器对于类型，如和、类返回唯一标识该属性和基本设计器类型。For example, in order to provide different types of simultaneously active designers for a type, such as an and an , the class returns a that uniquely identifies both the attribute and the base designer type. 构造函数，可指定其特定的类型，除了设计器的基本设计器类型和返回反映这。The constructor allows you to specify the base designer type of the designer in addition to its specific type, and returns a that reflects this. 因此在添加新具有与现有的基本设计器类型相同的类型的基本设计器类型，旧的属性将替换为新属性。Therefore when you add a new with a base designer type of the same type as the base designer type of an existing , the old attribute is replaced with the new attribute.
